name: Boundary Disk Use Summary
description: Scans the given device mount paths and reports the one with the least free space

paramSchema.title: Disk Name
paramSchema.name: diskname
paramSchema.description: The name of the disk to be appended to the hostname to display in the legend for the Disk Use Summary data.

paramSchema.title: Mount Point
paramSchema.name: dir
paramSchema.description: The mounted point to check for free space. (either this or the Mounted device need to be set for the plugin to function properly)

paramSchema.title: Device
paramSchema.name: device
paramSchema.description: The mounted device to check for free space. (either this or the Mount Point directory need to be set for the plugin to function properly)
